website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek maximum noise and vibration reduction, this heavy-duty contender is definitely one to consider.
pros: Good for personal exercise and yoga use as well
cons: Better for lighter workout routines, not heavy equipment

customer_reviews.title: Some odor, but it goes away.
customer_reviews.text: It would have gotten 5 stars for look and feel. Since it advertised and was labeled "odorless" and yet it stinks like solvent, it only gets 3 stars average due to false claims. I had to air it out in the attic for 2 days, then it was fine. When I first opened it I could smell it from 5 feet away and it started giving me a headache. I work with chemicals and work on cars, so I don't consider myself sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: My only gripe is that it could be 4-5 inches wider to better accommodate larger treadmills (like my proform pro 2000)
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made mat for the money. My only gripe is that it could be 4-5 inches wider to better accommodate larger treadmills (like my proform pro 2000). Mine fits JUST fits on there. I think with the size of consumer treadmills these days, they could stand to add a couple inches to the width to give you a little wiggle room. Other than that, great mat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Do people really get excited about gym mats?
customer_reviews.text: Yes, yes they do. I'm not one of them, but I will tell you that this mat has done its job in the month that it's been supporting my Proform HIIT Trainer Machine. I currently use the mat on a ceramic tile floor in my basement (on top of a concrete slab) and have had no issues. No tears, no weird smell, nothing. Perfect size for my machine. 2 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice mat. It is not a super hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mat. It is not a super hard plastic. It is a nice soft-ish rubber. So its not going to be indestructible but it will hold up well under your treadmill or other equipment. The material is almost a rubberized foam like material. Perfect for absorbing the shock of the machine. If you putting this on carpet, it will add nice protection. Great for the price and I can recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: WSymionowZ

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for normal home use. Like all these rubberized type equipment mats, it has that distinct rubber odor when you first open it. Just air it out. Any noticeable odor goes away quickly. I would not put this in a child's room or pet area because of the material. Works well to protect your floor and absorb some sound. Wipes clean. Have only had it for several months so I can not speak of its longevity yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Not heavyweight but pretty durable!
customer_reviews.text: This may is serving its purpose under my treadmill on top of the carpet! It works out just fine, not heavyweight so it doesn’t lay completely flat but for the money it does it’s job, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Gym quality at home!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for my MAXTRAINER M6, back in December. It's now April, and its still going strong. It's a great value, for the price. It's fairly thick with a hearty feel to it. I thought it would be too long for my machine, but turns out; it's the perfect size. When unrolled it will lay down flat with a little wait. It will lay flat faster if you put your item on it right away, like I did. And, it doesn't slide all around. Also, cool, because you can cut it to size if you need to. Great product. And I will be purchasing again for my powerblock [180lb. combined] dumbells.
customer_reviews.author: comis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Peloton
customer_reviews.text: For anyone thinking of getting this for your Peloton bike go for it!. The length for me is perfect for the bike. Easy wipe off cleaning and the bike is rock solid stable on this (laminate floor underneath)
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Bought this mat for a smaller treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a smaller treadmill, so I was able to cut about 45" off of the length and use the smaller piece for the area that I have my my bike pedal small unit onto so it would not slide on the floor when I used it, and also a put an Aerobic Step Trainer on for exercise on that also. This is a good quality mat and have been well pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W - FL

customer_reviews.title: Just Magical
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a Treadmill and placed it on concrete in my basement, it was shaky and would vibrate while I use it. This mat worked magic, all the vibration and shakyness just vanished. I am very pleased with this mat and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joyjeet Guha

customer_reviews.title: No Odor!
customer_reviews.text: Thick and heavy mats for my treadmill and recumbent bike. Textured, non slip. Generous size. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Buy USA!

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This mat is just long enough to support my treadmill, gives just enough cushion to protect the carpet and add a little bit more shock absorption, but isn't so thick that it knocks the balance off. Overall a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cycling bikes
customer_reviews.text: This mat works amazing. I have it under my Peloton Cycling bike and it fits perfectly. I don't recommend using on carpet. It seemed not to like the carpet as much for the bike and therefore it wobbled on carpet. But I moved it to a hardwood surface and it works amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to put under a treadmill that I also ordered from Amazon and it's working well. It's pretty thick and provides quite a bit of support. I would think this would be good to use for a yoga mat too, it's much thicker!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Proffet

customer_reviews.title: Great product that we used on our new porcelain tile ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product that we used on our new porcelain tile so our treadmill remained level. It also helped to reduce the treadmill noise on the tile. Great product for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: CRich

customer_reviews.title: Its thin, but it looks good and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: It is thin, but it looks good. I bought an identical one over a year ago, which has been under our heavy treadmill and that one still looks new. There are indents where the treadmill legs have rested on it, but no rips or other damage. That is why I bought the second one for under our elliptical.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Burns

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this addition to our workout area. We didn't notice any smell like other workout mats we have checked out in stores. It fits perfectly under our treadmill and has solved the "treadmill rattling" sound we had before when using it. It is a little thin but feels dense and sturdy. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: J.Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this to put my treadmill on on hopefully cushion sound and protect the floor. No complaints but can't compare to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: ang

customer_reviews.title: It Seemed to Save the Carpet and Withstood the Year I Used It
customer_reviews.text: This mat is think and sturdy and, after having it under my treadmill for about a year, when I sold the treadmill, I found there were only slight indentations in the carpet beneath the mat, which faded away after a week or so. I'm not sure how it would be on hardwood floors. It also seemed to deaden the noise of the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: ElbeauTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: Great product to protect your hard floor
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for my treadmill and it prevents damage or indentations in our new flooring. I looked under it after I had used it for a while and the floor is perfect underneath.
customer_reviews.author: General28

customer_reviews.title: Good mat
customer_reviews.text: Protects my hardwood floors from my treadmill. Smells funny when it first arrives, but it dissipates after a few days. Doesn't slip.
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: Mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great. My old cat used my first one as a bathroom so $50 down the drain there. Then I found this one though why not I'll give it a shot. The cost was good. And it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The map is thin but heavy duty and it seems to take the weight of the treadmill without issue and does not appear to be breaking down at all after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: NEO

customer_reviews.title: Great Equipment Pad for my Proforma Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It was easy to open, unroll, and layout flat. I let it lay flat for one day to fully flatten each end. After, the treadmill went on perfectly! Make sure to measure the exercise equipment base before purchasing to ensure fit. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: nyteachnc

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid material that doesn't absorb sweat or odors
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid material that doesn't absorb sweat or odors, unlike the cheap open-cell foam you see in some mats. I use it under my bike trainer and it's absolutely perfect for what I need. Great size to fit under a bicycle trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Eric the Red

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our treadmill and very nice quality. The same quality as another mat we paid a lot more for
customer_reviews.author: EEM

customer_reviews.title: Great For Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, protects the wood floor and absorbs some impact and noise.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on Amazon....this mat is durable and doesn’t smell or bleed on carpet. I have had this mat under my treadmill on carpet for almost 3 months. It is great...see my pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for keeping my floors from being scratched up by the treadmill. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great size and perfect for our treadmill. Using on carpet and nothing moves around. Was afraid this may have an odor when it arrived, but did not. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what I needed, and more importantly, what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Beacham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works! No more dents in the floor, no more shaking treadmill. Helps with the sound too.
customer_reviews.author: coolcat

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: This mat is exactly what I had hoped for. Commercial gym quality and fits perfectly under my exercise bike with plenty of extra room all around. Stepping on this with my bike shoe cleats does not damage the mat, indentations from the cleats pop right back up. I did not have any issues with odor or with it lying flat.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise mat
customer_reviews.text: Use this as an exercise mat. It works great for that and rolls up nicely for easy storage when I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Mark I

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough
customer_reviews.text: Putting this under my treadmill has greatly reduced noise and vibration on my cement floor. So far it seems as tough as it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: FrancoFile

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Very happy with quality and performance!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect under my recumbent bike and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new treadmill and this mat was perfect to go under it. Its not too thick, but thick enough.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace worn one. Arrived quickly, well packaged. Very, very slight rubbery smell. I opened and left overnight. Next day, perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat!
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat! A bit larger than needed, but larger is better than smaller. It doesn't slip while I'm working out on the treadmill. Promptly delivered. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly under our treadmill to reduce the sound of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly under our treadmill to reduce the sound of my pounding feet. Another option would be to get a new treadmill but thanks to this mat our 20 year old treadmill can live another day.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fastidious

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but gets the job done. I was pleased it didn't have a strong smell after opening and once laid out the ends flattened out after about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: J. Presley

customer_reviews.title: It's the right size and is a nice material. Solid enough to protect the hardwood floor ...
customer_reviews.text: This mat works very well under my treadmill. It's the right size and is a nice material. Solid enough to protect the hardwood floor underneath yet gives good cushioning for the treadmill. This was the right choice and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Catsidy

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and does what it is supposed to. I have it over carpet and it is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: A little thin for on carpet... the orbital still wobbles a little
customer_reviews.author: DLaughter

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and good size for my machine. It's just the right thickness to protect our hardwoods while proving good stability for the machine.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. O. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my space and treadmill, size and thickness as described.
customer_reviews.author: Pallas

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I left it rolled up partially against the wall where it was too long. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Peloton bike which I use in my unfinished basement. Size is great and it seems to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits the entire treadmill on it with some room to spare
customer_reviews.text: Fits the entire treadmill on it with some room to spare. Feels durable and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lada

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. Best for a concrete or hardwood surface on a slab or first floor. It certainly does not dampen the sound that much from upstairs for those below.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this under my peloton on shag carpet. No issues with it
customer_reviews.author: jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to protect my wood floor under the treadmill. We had no problems with it tearing. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Hilburn

customer_reviews.title: Great for home gym
customer_reviews.text: The perfect mat for under my equipment. Cushions and will protect my carpet from the weight. Id recommend. Just make sure to measure and get the correct suez for under your equipment. Could also be used as a yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Woman

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly thick and durable
customer_reviews.text: Love the mats! I am setting up a Bowflex in my home gym and these are the perfect size to fit under that equipment and a hip sled. They are thick and easily cushion the weight from harming my hardwood floor!
customer_reviews.author: EveS

customer_reviews.title: A Mat For All Reasons
customer_reviews.text: Holding up very well under a heavy treadmill and on top of a plush carpet. Moved to place several times without ripping or damage. Measure exercise unit before ordering. This one just fits.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Vance

customer_reviews.title: Superb Mat
customer_reviews.text: Great, hefty mat. I put my elliptical on this which both rest on my carpeted, basement floor. There was no odor at all and the thing does its job well. It was the perfect size for my full-sized machine. I would not hesitate suggesting this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: SirAlexFerguson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Nice material, no odor, and seems sturdy enough to protect my laminate flooring.
customer_reviews.author: J. Earl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mat fits our elliptical perfectly and lays flat all around.
customer_reviews.author: B. Michaud

customer_reviews.title: The mat works fine and is exactly the right size for my Precor ...
customer_reviews.text: The mat works fine and is exactly the right size for my Precor 9.35i treadmill. It had a bit of a smell at first, but that has faded after a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Don't use it a lot but it is well functioned ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't use it a lot but it is well functioned. And it is really heavy to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: ICE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Delivery was fast. Buying a second one today.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good mats for the money. used in our senior center activity room.
customer_reviews.author: yendlo

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It protects my carpet from some of the impact of the treadmill. Though it is a bit too narrower, but I knew that from all the measurements and was unable to find anything wider.
customer_reviews.author: bmax123

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: We have had our treadmill now for six months and the mat has been down for the entire time. it is a perfect mat for our needs; protecting the carpet and everything stays in place. Recommend this for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: W.O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money with branded mats. This is actually better than mist of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good mat but susceptible to really heavy equipment. Will not protect the carpet from indentions.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits the treadmill very well, keeps it off the carpet. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: IdahoFolks

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck. I appreciate that the mat has zero stickers/branding (it's all black) and the thickness is adequate for my bike trainer to protect my wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: darn1982

customer_reviews.title: Thick rubber with no strong smell at all
customer_reviews.text: Thick mat. No rubber smell. True dimensions. Have it under the Live Strong Elliptical.
customer_reviews.author: Josey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting floors
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much I bought another one for my husbands bike. It is large enough for my elliptical and his training bike.
customer_reviews.author: WI Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mat
customer_reviews.text: Holding up great so far and doesn't have that strong rubber smell that a natural latex mat does
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Our 10-year old treadmill fits on this perfectly. With about 1.5 inches on each side and in the front, there is still roughly a 12 inch space behind that catches the occasional dust that comes out. Because of other reviews I had read, I took it out of the packaging right away and left in the garage for about a week before bringing in. I noticed a very slight plastic smell when I first opened, but it has not smelled at all since it was brought inside. Seems very durable, and the thickness is appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Claton Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect under Wahoo KICKR
customer_reviews.text: Used this mat under my Wahoo KICKR cycling trainer. Dimensions are identical to the Wahoo version and less than half the price. Keeps the floor clean and allows the unit to run a little bit quieter.
customer_reviews.author: fisherbln

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell!!
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT SMELL!!! This works great and I am sooo happy it does not stink up my house like the old one!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Decent mat for the price
customer_reviews.text: The mat was as advertised. It fits our elliptical perfectly. Material quality appears to be decent
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Mat
customer_reviews.text: I am using the mat under my elliptical and I really like it. It seems like a good quality mat. I haven't had it for long, so not sure about the long term quality, but for now, it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good for exercise bike
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use with an exercise bike. Seems to be perfect. It lays fine over carpet and protects the floor.
customer_reviews.author: rharris3011

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. I have this under my 600 lb ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I have this under my 600 lb lat machine. Will definately buy another for other products in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Windows 82

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the treadmill
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the treadmill. I had some reservations becuase of the size of our treadmill but it worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great under my treadmill. It could stand to be a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any treadmill owner that wants floor protection. It came quickly, packaged nicely, and fit the bill perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Dita

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, sized appropriately and did not have that "plastic" smell when unrolled. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nicholberry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, and fast shipment of product sooner than expected. I would buy again, and recommend friends and family to buy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: works great for my extra long treadmill
customer_reviews.text: fit perfect, this is ontop of carpet so do not notice any extra "sponge" action. but overall am pleased with product
customer_reviews.author: Ody

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: Really works well and stays in place fairly well over carpeting. Handles tough wear and use. Nicely made. Would buy again in the distant future.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper's High

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed and fits my elliptical perfectly while protecting the carpet
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGal10

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mat Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my new bike.., not slippery and looks to have a lasting quality and is a great fit for the area.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. Perfect for protecting my carpet. Treadmill sits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Debra E Green

customer_reviews.title: Not made to hold equipment
customer_reviews.text: Thin foam mat .It is sold as a mat to put gym equipment on but in no way would you want to do this. It is thin and foam , We tried to use it under a Bowflex Treadclimer and all it did was sink into the mat ( because it is a thin foam). Maybe it would be good for a mat to do crunches or sit ups on but no way it is firm enough to put any equipment on.
customer_reviews.author: danielle morcom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and quality is great. Almost no smell when opened.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cushiony. Keeps my home gym in place, and protects the carpeting underneath.
customer_reviews.author: CJP@satx

customer_reviews.title: As represented
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easily handles heavy exercise equipment. Delivery was prompt and item was as promised. Highly recommended for ellipticals as well as other types of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Good Value! We put this under our eliptical, and so far so good. Does exactly what we expected, protects our floors.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Fogarty

customer_reviews.title: No smell! Works great on Bowflex Treadclimbers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put under my Bowflex Treadclimber because Bowflex charges a ridiculous price theirs. It's holding up great and didn't tear when I rolled the machine onto the mat. It actually makes the workout/machine more stable. It fits perfectly for the TC10 size machine. It also is 6mm as advertised. The best part is no nauseating rubber smell that you get from other mats. I have this on laminate floors in the bedroom and it's been great and won't stink up the room!
customer_reviews.author: AMZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped immediately
customer_reviews.text: I setup my new horizon fitness T101-04 Treadmill on this and it ripped immediately, now has a little hole in the middle where the treadmill foot was
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's asked to do
customer_reviews.text: I can't rank this any higher than 4 stars, simply because it's not a standout product. It's thick enough to protect my laminate floors from the bouncing impact of my treadmill. It comes rolled up quite tightly, and it took several minutes to unroll the mat and get it to lay flat enough that I could roll my treadmill over the top of it. Meanwhile, I had to continuously walk on it to flatten it out. It does a good job, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hatzenbuehler

customer_reviews.title: Protect the floor and carpet well
customer_reviews.text: Made of good material and protect the floor and carpet well
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Fit treadmill perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fit the Sole F80 treadmill perfectly. Good mat, no smell.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Not as tough as PVC - tore easily
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item due to the great reviews and seeing "PVC" in the title. PVC is a very tough material that should easily withstand tearing, however, it developed a tear immediately when I was trying to walk my treadmill into its final position. In my opinion this material behaves more like a tough rubber than a PVC material. If you don't need the toughness then it will be fine but I would have appreciated seeing a review which told me that this was not as tough as PVC.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat to go under my treadmill, over carpet. It fits perfectly, was easy to unroll and place under the treadmill by myself and looks good. It deals well with the pressure points of the treadmill and has protected my carpet very well. Would definitely recommend this product, it is worth spending a little more to protect your floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

product_meta.title: Gympak PVC Treadmill Equipment Mat
product_meta.description: Protect your floors with this high quality PVC treadmill mat and lessen the noise Nonslip and odorless Does not curl and remains flat
feature_bullets: High density black PVC feel the difference
